name: TriviaRoyale
0:
”Alexa, play Trivia Royale”
”Alexa, start Trivia Royale”
”Alexa, open Trivia Royale”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia royale
des:
Test your brain power against other trivia fans in a battle royale style trivia game:

◆ You and nine other players will answer ten multiple-choice trivia questions.
◆ If you get a question wrong, you will lose health. If you get a question right, you will gain health.
◆ As the quiz progresses, right and wrong answers will have a greater impact on your health. 
◆ If your health drops to zero, you will be eliminated. Survive to the end of the quiz with the highest health score to win.
◆ Complete quizzes to earn leaderboard points and climb the weekly global leaderboard.

New questions are added regularly.

Feedback and support: support@smartpenguin.digital
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
